title: Angel & Faith: Season Nine #4
description: As Angel continues his quest to resurrect the dead by following leads he digs out of the Watcher's Files, Faith has second thoughts about supporting his seemingly impossible venture. A new ally warns her to weigh the consequencesgood and badof Angel's endeavor. Meanwhile, amidst clubbing, mentoring, and slaying, Faith has her own concerns, counseling a damaged and vengeance-seeking Slayer! There's pressure from all sides. Can Faith handle it? The blood-soaked first-arc finale! The Big Bads are here!
author: Christos Gage
